title: Sri Lanka beat W.Indies by 57 runs in World Twenty20
content: Sri Lanka beat West Indies by 57 runs in their World Twenty20 Super Eight Group F match at the Kensington Oval on Friday. Sri Lanka 195-3 off 20 overs (M. Jayawardene 98 not out, K. Sangakkara 68) v West Indies 138-8 off 20 overs…
